name: Skinwalker Shaman
description: The ultimate transformation master who has transcended the boundaries of a single form. Commands four distinct shapes, each with powerful abilities.

abilities.name: Beast Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a wolf with attack speed and crit.

abilities.name: Bird Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a raven, gaining flight and ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Serpent Form
abilities.description: Transforms into a serpent with poison and evasion.

abilities.name: True Form
abilities.description: Reveals terrible True Form with all abilities.
